title: Can't post on board on my smurf
body: So i recently made another account just to mess around with and on the boards it says that you have to be over level 6 to post yet im level 17 on that account and i still can't post ;-; and it is actually quite funny because of the bug i couldn't post about it to ask for help.

replies.body: It can take a bit for your account to sync up to the boards, and posting here could help force that through.  If this is still an issue, toss me the summoner name and I'll see if I can help sync it up!
Yeah, i mean i've prob had the account over level 6 for maybe a week now, the user is: Freeeazy
Thanks!  I've booped your account for a boards sync.  You may need to relog on the boards, but let me know if that worked out for you!
